document.full_text: a new york man who uploaded an unfinished copy of the 2009 blockbuster "x-men origins: wolverine" has pleaded guilty to felony copyright infringement.
document.title: "wolverine" pirate pleads guilty in copyright case
lines_and_colors: a new york man who uploaded an unfinished copy of the 2009 blockbuster "x-men origins: wolverine" has pleaded guilty to felony copyright infringement.
